channel.title: Gauntlet Community Open Gaming October (Please Read)
channel.description:
Gauntlet Community Open Gaming is happening this coming weekend. If you're signed up for an event and haven't received an email from your GM, be sure to check your spam folder. We've had some set-up emails going to spam folders.
If you still need help with events, please check out our Discord for the con: https://discord.gg/GghazdT which will be active starting Thursday.
